project_descr: This project aims at enhancing and promoting stability, religious tolerance and peaceful co-existence in Ethiopia, thereby minimizing the tendencies of religious radicalization and extremism leading to instability and shaping violent conflicts.

outputs.output_descr: This project aims at enhancing and promoting stability, religious tolerance and peaceful co-existence in Ethiopia, thereby minimizing the tendencies of religious radicalization and extremism leading to instability and shaping violent conflicts.
